name: String
Duskblade
passive: A hero that starts his turn adjacent to this lieutenant receives -1 Speed for that turn. Each of this lieutenant's attacks gains: Surge: Pierce 5.;Effect:Duskblade

name: String
Staff of Light
action: Attack. Action: Each hero within 3 spaces of you recovers 1 Heart and 1 Fatigue.;Effect:StaffOfLight

name: String
Staff of Shadows
action: Exhaust this card and discard 1 Overlord card from your hand to either draw 1 Overlord card or force a reroll of any 1 die. You may do this at any time, even if it's not your turn.;Effect:StaffOfShadows

name: String
Fortuna's Dice
action: Exhaust this card and suffer 1 Fatigue to reroll any 1 die you have just rolled.;Effect:Reroll:Relic

name: String
Bones of Woe
passive: At the start of each of your turns, roll the blue attack die. On a Surge, draw 1 Overlord card.;Effect:BonesOfWoe

name: String
Shield of the Dark God
action: Exhaust this card after rolling defense dice to reroll some or all of the defense dice. Keep the new result only if it is better.;Effect:ShieldDarkGod

name: String
Shield of Zorek's Favor
passive: Each time an attack targeting this lieutenant is resolved and they are not defeated, this lieutenant tests Might. If they pass, the attacker suffers 1 Heart for each Shield rolled on this test.;Effect:ShieldZoreksFavor

name: String
Scorpion's Kiss
action:
This lieutenant gains:
Action: Exhaust this card and choose a hero in your line of sight. That hero tests Awareness. If they fail, they are Immobilized and Poisoned. If they pass, they only suffer 1 of those conditions of your choice.;Effect:ScorpionsKiss

name: String
The Shadow Rune
action: Attack. Each time you defeat a monster with this weapon, recover 1 Fatigue.;Effect:FatigueOnKill

name: String
The Shadow Rune (Overlord)
passive: Baron Zachareth only. Each of your attacks gain: Surge: +2 Heart, Surge: +1 Range, +1 Heart, Surge: Draw 1 Overlord Card;Effect:BecomeRanged;Effect:EquipLimit:Zachareth
